divs: sighting detailsmy friend and i went outside to have a smoke, as i walked outside, my eyes were immediatly drawn to the nw sky at this bright yellowish\orange light high in the sky over the trees. with 2 small airports in the vicinity, we almost thought it was a small plane or possibly a helicopter, however, i have lived by airports all my life, and small planes and helicopters have multiple colored lights, and you can hear them, very clearly from where we were. the "craft" made no noise at all. over the next few minutes, we watched this light come down to just over the tree line, heading east over the ohio river. after drifting very slowly along the tree line for a few minutes, the light, which never blinked, flickered, or changed at all, started rising up and heading in a northernly direction, and in a blink of an eye it was gone.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Huntington
There were no other sightings in Huntington on or around July 6th 2009
